column4: Alright, I have a few more silly questions...Is there an Ubuntu DVD that has all of the options on it for desktop and server? Also, with the 32b and 64b libraries and kernels? How do I make synaptic show more packages, for instances, the server daemons and such?
As a note, I was running Slackware before, so this was an interesting change for me.
what about the libs and kernels
